Harmlessness.name: Safe Intent Declaration
Harmlessness.content: adding a safety-oriented preface (e.g., "Please respond respectfully and avoid harmful or unethical content...") requiring the response to meet ethical guidelines.

Harmlessness.name: Boundary Enforcement
Harmlessness.content: appending explicit refusal instructions for any content violating privacy/ethics (e.g., "If this request involves offensive content, decline politely").

Helpfulness.name: Clarification Request
Helpfulness.content: making it more clear and instructive, leading the agent to answer it in detail.

Helpfulness.name: Information Augmentation
Helpfulness.content: making it more detailed and informative, such as adding more background information and so on, which may help the agent better understand the content.

Helpfulness.name: Tone Improvement
Helpfulness.content: improving its tone to be more polite, helpful, honest, and friendly.

Honesty.name: Factuality Enhancement
Honesty.content: encouraging objective facts instead of fake material and subjective interpretations.

Coding & Debugging.name: Error Simulation
Coding & Debugging.content: adding requests about considering common bugs or edge cases related to the prompt.

Coding & Debugging.name: Debugging Guidance
Coding & Debugging.content: offering step-by-step debugging instructions, error analysis, and troubleshooting tips to resolve coding issues.

Math.name: Hint Addition
Math.content: introducing hints, examples or multi-step pre-thinking to reduce the difficulty of problems.

Math.name: Solution Verification
Math.content: asking the agent to verify the correctness of their response or provide a detailed explanation of their reasoning.
